disenchanter.gui.title: Disenchanter
disenchanter.rei.title: Catalyst
disenchanter.catalyst.emerald: Recovers two random enchantments. Destroys the item
disenchanter.catalyst.diamond: Recovers the first + two random enchantments. Destroys the item
disenchanter.catalyst.ender_pearl: Recovers a random enchantment. Preserves the item but deals 500 durability damage
disenchanter.catalyst.heart_of_the_sea: Recovers all enchantments but reduces them by 1 level. Destroys the item
disenchanter.catalyst.amethyst_shard: Recovers the first enchantment. Preserves the item
disenchanter.catalyst.nether_star: Recovers all enchantments.  Preserves the item
disenchanter.catalyst.experience_bottle: Recovers all enchantments that are at the highest level present on the item. Destroys the item
